definition: to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of external application of Xiaoji powder on the gastrointestinal motility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药消积散外敷对胃肠动力的影响。

sentences.english: Methods:A total of 8 patients with intralipid leakage treated with fresh aloe local external applying.
sentences.chinese: 观察8例鲜芦荟局部外敷治疗脂肪乳渗漏的情况。

sentences.english: Used in bath water, it relieves rheumatalgia and has antiseptic action.
sentences.chinese: 用于外敷，它能够愈合，清洁并有消毒作用。

sentences.english: The treatment group were given TCM treatment, and external deposited Reticulitermes external application.
sentences.chinese: 治疗组采用传统中医辨证论治，并配合敷胸散外敷。

sentences.english: In the middle stage, Dinggui and Furong powders were scattered on the plasters respectively.
sentences.chinese: 后期单用丁桂散或芙蓉粉直接撒在棉花上外敷。

sentences.english: This medicine is for external application.
The towers are in the shape of bottle gourds and whitewashed.
sentences.chinese: 塔呈圆形，状近葫芦，外敷白色。

sentences.english: Conclusion Internal and external medicine in effective for cholelithiasis.
sentences.chinese: 提示中药内服外敷是治疗胆石症的有效方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of using antiphlogistine in treating phlebophlogosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨用止痛消炎膏外敷治疗静脉炎的效果。

sentences.english: Burn treatment, amount of fresh calla lily tubers, mash and external application.
sentences.chinese: 治烫伤，鲜马蹄莲块茎适量，捣烂外敷。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
to mash/to beat to a pulp
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
draw out pus by applying a plaster to the affected area
